attributes.action: abolish prescription charges for Asthma sufferers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Asthma medication is needed by asthma suffers much like diabetes medication is a must have for sufferers of the condition, without the inhalers asthma sufferers ,much like diabetes suffers could die. Diabetes medication after a certain type is free but Asthma medication is full prescription price.

Why are asthma suffers charged for their medication yet if I was female and wanted the contraceptive pill I could get it free??

Support this petition and help thousands of Asthma sufferers in the uk.
